0: I was three years old, when you and I moved to the Chi
1: Late December, harsh winter gave me a cold
2: You fixed me up something that was good for my soul
3: Famous homemade chicken soup, can I have another bowl?
4: You work late nights just to keep on the lights
5: Mommy got me training wheels so I could keep on my bike
6: And you would give anything in this world
7: Michael Jackson leather and a glove, but didn't give me no curl
8: And you never put no man over me
9: And I love you for that mommy can't you see?
10: Seven years old, caught you with tears in your eyes
11: Cuz somebody cheatin, telling you lies, then I started to cry
12: As we knelt on the kitchen floor
13: I said mommy I'mma love you till you don't hurt no more
14: And when I'm older, you ain't gotta work no more
15: And I'mma get you that mansion that we couldn't afford
17: Highly capable, lady that's makin loot
18: A living legend too, just look at what heaven do
19: Send us an angel, and I thank you Mama
21: I wanna scream so loud for you, cause I'm so proud of you
22: And let me tell you what I'm about to do
23: Mama, you know I love you so, and I'll never let you go
24: And I wrote this song just so you know that when you go
title: Hey Mama (Grammy Version)
